name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance web applications. Proficient in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and **Tailwind**, with a strong command of creating seamless user experiences. Well-versed in building and consuming **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL**, ensuring robust data interaction and organization.
Demonstrated expertise in testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **React Testing Library**, coupled with experience in end-to-end testing using **Playwright**. Skilled in implementing CI/CD practices to optimize development workflows and enhance code quality.
Additionally, I bring experience in compliance-driven development within the healthcare and financial sectors, understanding regulations such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. A strong foundation in **AI/ML** technologies and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure** complements my capabilities, enabling the development of innovative solutions aligned with industry standards.
